trans-unit.source: Contains a read-only collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects for each <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含唯讀的集合<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref>每個物件<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>中<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A user cannot add or remove a <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> from the collection, but can change the properties of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> corresponding to a particular <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法加入或移除<xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>從集合中，但是可以變更的屬性<xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>對應至特定<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> </xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>

trans-unit.source: Adding or removing a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from the DataSet adds or removes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 新增或移除<xref:System.Data.DataTable>集中加入或移除對應<xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>集合中。</xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合物件複製到一維<xref:System.Array>指定索引處開始的執行個體。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>也就是說值從集合複製的目的地。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index of the array at which to start inserting.
trans-unit.target: 要開始插入的陣列索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合物件複製到一維<xref:System.Array>指定索引處開始的執行個體。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>也就是說值從集合複製的目的地。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index of the array at which to start inserting.
trans-unit.target: 要開始插入的陣列索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> objects is the same as the number of <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>物件是<xref:System.Data.DataTable><xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>中的物件</xref:System.Data.DataTable>的數目相同</xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>數目

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>物件。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref>處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否存取<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref>為同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: This property implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會實作<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> using the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步化的版本<xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>使用<xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>

trans-unit.source: This property is always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, unless overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性一律為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，除非在衍生類別覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects of the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref>的指定物件<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>從集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>尋找。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> specified by its index.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>依索引所指定。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>尋找。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> specified by its name.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref>的<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>其名稱所指定。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>尋找。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> using the SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步化的版本<xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>使用 SyncRoot 屬性。</xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>

trans-unit.source: Program code must always perform synchronized operations on the SyncRoot of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>, not directly on the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼必須一律會執行同步處理的作業的 SyncRoot <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>，不是直接在<xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>

trans-unit.source: This guarantees the correct operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保衍生自其他物件的集合中正常運作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains the correct synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，它會維護與其他執行緒可能同時修改<xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> ，正確地同步處理

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"> </xref>。
